name: similar mix
description:
The game is an action-RPG where players take on the role of a ninja who's battling to save a village from the Yakuza.
You play as Kuzuryuu, a ninja who at some point in his life joined the Zaburou clan as a child. The people of his village are dead, and the Zaburou have become feared and violent. Outhouse Media hopes that Kuzuryuu and his friends will find answers to the mystery surrounding the death of their elders. However, the game takes place in the fictional country of Yokohama. The game has sold well so far and has been praised by fans and critics. Keep your eyes open for more information on this title. Bloodborne will be available on Windows PC, Xbox One, and PS4 in 2016. Stay tuned to GamesIndustry.biz for more updates.
